p: The new compounds 406– 407 were subjected for determination of the xanthine oxidase (XO) inhibitory activity using microtiter plate based NBT assay. Allopurinol was used as a positive control with IC 50 value of 0.18 ± 0.02 µg/mL. 406 and 407 showed XO inhibitory activity with IC 50 values of 2.81 ± 0.71 and 0.41 ± 0.1 µg/mL, respectively. The oxidized form of 406 also showed high XO inhibition with IC 50 value of 0.35 ± 0.13 µg/mL [ 133].
